title: Super Girls, Supergirls For Love 1983 Olinka Hardiman, Peter Bond, Ivonne Monaco, Lisa De Carlo, Eva Cordes, Margit Ojetz + Walter Molitor

sources.title: Super Girls, Supergirls For Love 1983 Olinka Hardiman, Peter Bond, Ivonne Monaco, Lisa De Carlo, Eva Cordes, Margit Ojetz + Walter Molitor
sources.description: Softcore version of movie, not great quality but Olinka looks good in it. Originally shot in 3D and there are still a few "throw things at the screen" moments. May need to set your viewer to 4:3 for best results.
